page.title: 06MARL PITS SPORTS CENTRE
page.content: Marl Pits Sports Centre is situated off Newchurch Road, Rawtenstall. It serves Rawtenstall and district and comprises an indoor swimming pool, outdoor athletics track, a miniature golf course, soccer,rugby and cricket pitches and a newly built outdoor fitness trail. The swimming pool is used by local schools during school days and is open to the public in the evenings, at weekends and during school holidays. It is also the home of Rawtenstall Amateur Swimming Club. The football, rugby and cricket pitches are used by local amateur teams and the sports pavilion has changing and shower facilities. The athletics track is used by Rossendale Athletics Club, schools and members of the public.
